data.message: hey i thought u diss trump for some fucking plan that u say hillary pay u for that campaign speech shit and trump get voted but no plan at all. i used to try to find peace just like you, try to have a mind like everybody else, though it's stupid but peaceful. i know how it slow down my spirit ( i get fucked up before i feel happy completely ) and i am calm enough to realize your situation but i won't tell what i think cause you're supposed to do it by your own. however, save rap! punk
